quote_last: at home. Sunday. She’d be up. Probably reading over a cup of coffee before taking a run before church.
title: Soldier On
author: Vanessa Rasanen

quote_first: Suddenly, he started to cry. Curled up on the sofa he sobbed loudly. Michel looked at his watch; it was
quote_last: . On the screen a wild cat had a rabbit in its mouth.
title: Atomised
author: Michel Houellebecq
